info.name: fo_100_verify_to_create_bank_payment_for_pos_order
info.description:
Testsuite: Verify to create new transaction via bank account (QR)

Testcase:

1. Login with owner account
    
2. Get data
    
    1. account coa / get list account
        
    2. account bank / get list bank account
        
    3. pos_order / get list pos_order => get pos_order had payment_account_id & un_paid/partital_paid status
        
    4. pos_order / get pos_order detail => update more data for pos_order at 2.c.
        
    5. Posting / Get list posting => get total posting
        
    6. payment / get list payment => get total
        
    7. home-report / cash flow => get data
        
    8. home-report / account receivable unpaid => get data (only account_receivable)
        
    9. home-report / account receivable customer => get data (only account_receivable)
        
    10. home-report / account life time => get data
        
    11. home-report / cash-flow period => get data
        
    12. home-report / profit loss period => get data (income & expense)
        
    13. Transaction / Get list transaction => get total transaction
        
3. Create transaction
    
    1. payment / gen payment QR
        
    2. payment / gen payment QR by buyer
        
    3. (\*) hook / pay for this QR
        
4. Check data
    
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction => have new record (\*2)
        
    2. Transaction / Get transaction detail => data correctly
        
    3. \[New\] payment / get list payment => increase 1
        
    4. \[New\] payment / get payment detail => data correctly
        
    5. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => check respective banlance_amount
        
    6. pos_order / Get list pos_order => check pos_order status at 2.c
        
    7. pos_order / Get pos_order detail => update data
        
    8. Posting / get list posting => have 2 new posting (account receivable & account debit)
        

Note:

- ~~Không cần call HOOK, server sẽ tự động hook sau 10s để payment sau khi gen QR => tự hook để ghi nhận bút toán~~ => MB 10s sẽ tự hook để thanh toán, còn Shinhan & GP cần phải tự hook
    
- (\*) nếu gen QR galaxy pay / shinhan thì phải tự call hook
    
- (\*2) Nếu hook có phí sẽ sinh ra 2 transactions
